homeDescription: This interface displays a number of data visualizations from AT-Election-Prediction-analyses. Click one of the options to see more.

trends.name: Raw Likes
trends.description: In this view you can browse and inspect poll predictions based on Facebook-Likes. You can also activate poll data or election results. In order to open an analysis-dataset, you will have to press the charts button on the top-right-corner.

trendsAbsolute.name: Raw Likes - Absolute
trendsAbsolute.description: In this view you can browse and inspect poll predictions based on Facebook-Likes. You can also activate poll data or election results. In order to open an analysis-dataset, you will have to press the charts button on the top-right-corner.

multiChart.name: Multichart
multiChart.description: See all exposure charts on one page.

timeseries.name: Timeseries
timeseries.description: This timeseries-chart shows for each Danish party how the likes of all users that predominantly like this party are distributed over all parties over time.

pie.name: Pie Chart
pie.description: This pie-chart shows for each Danish party how the likes of all users that predominantly like this party are distributed over all parties aggregated over one or multiple weeks (you can set the timeframe with the sliders).

chord.name: Chord Chart
chord.description: This chord-chart shows the likes of all users that predominantly like one party are distributed over all parties aggregated over one or multiple weeks (you can set the timeframe with the sliders). The color of a chord between two parties indicates that the surplus of likes goes towards that party with the same color.

sankey.name: Sankey Chart
sankey.description: This sankey-chart shows for each Danish party how the likes of all users that predominantly like this party are distributed over all parties aggregated over one or multiple weeks (you can set the timeframe with the sliders).

flow.name: Flow Chart
flow.description: This simple Like-Flow visualization simply shows the net-flow of likes between one party and the others.

waffle.name: Waffle Chart
waffle.description: Waffle chart representation of where a party's users' likes go to.
